name: P44
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A dark sedan with tinted windows. The vehicle pulls up and idles in the driveway, no one exits, just sits there. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 20-second duration.
